page.title: 12CHICHESTER FESTIVAL THEATRE.
page.content: From the determination of one man,{ {Mr. Leslie Evershed-Martin OBE,}has grown the successful & world renowned theatre of today. The idea for{ "The {Impossible Theatre"}as it has come to be known, developed after the founder had seen a television programme in 1959 about a theatre in{Stratford, {(Ontario, Canada). }It took only just over three years to raise the funds required for the theatre to become a reality & against all odds the thrust- staged theatre with an auditorium of {1,374}seats opened for its first season on{July 5th 1962. Sir Laurence {Olivier }was its first director. During the following years many famous actors, actresses and directors have worked here. 1986 will see its {25th {anniversary}& "The Impossible Theatre" will have achieved much more than its founder could possibly have foreseen.
